casebody.data:
No. 11-572. Countrywide Financial Corporation, et al., Petitioners v. David H. Luther, et al. 565 U.S. 1080, 132 S. Ct. 832,

181 L. Ed. 2d 527,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 8743. December 5, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Appeal of California, Second Appellate District, denied.

Same case below, 195 Cal. App. 4th 789, 125 Cal. Rptr. 3d 716.
